results.title: Association of metformin use and survival in patients with cutaneous melanoma and diabetes.

results.title: Metformin regulates ferroptosis in Skin cutaneous melanoma via ATF3/NRF2 axis.

results.title: Relationship between type 2 diabetes mellitus and markers of cutaneous melanoma aggressiveness: an observational multicentric study in 443 patients with melanoma.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: To explore potential associations between @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, glycaemic control and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment and the aggressiveness of @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma_Cutaneous_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562393 @@@cutaneous melanoma@@@.

results.title: Metformin - For the dermatologist
results.text_hl: Very recently, systemic usage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @DISEASE_Psoriasis @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma_Cutaneous_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562393 @@@cutaneous malignancies@@@ has shown promising results.

results.title: [The first results of assessment of clinical efficacy of melatonin and metformin in patients with disseminated skin melanoma receiving dacarbazine as first-line systemic therapy].
results.text_hl: The aim of the study was to assess efficacy and safety of combined therapy with @CHEMICAL_Dacarbazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003606 @@@dacarbazine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in comparison with @CHEMICAL_Dacarbazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003606 @@@dacarbazine@@@ alone in the 1st line of therapy of @<m>DISEASE_Melanoma_Cutaneous_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562393 @@@cutaneous melanoma@@@.
